project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file and the application will interact with users through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the ability to add a contact
Implement the ability to search for a contact
Implement the ability to update a contact
Implement the ability to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling to store contacts
Implement user interaction through the terminal
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
